record.title: UNANIMOUS CONSENT AGREEMENT--EXECUTIVE CALENDAR

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the vote on the judicial nomination of the judge from Oklahoma be modified for the vote to occur immediately after the Senate convenes tomorrow morning, Friday, under the same conditions provided under the previous order.
I would say this has been cleared with Senator Leahy and Senate Specter.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
